title: How to Fill a Bean Bag Chair

steps.title: Inspect the delivered package for damage.
steps.content: Inspect the delivered package for damage. Return the package immediately if there is a problem.

steps.title: Inspect carefully your flat bean bag chair, checking for any signs of rips and holes in the fabric.
steps.content: Inspect carefully your flat bean bag chair, checking for any signs of rips and holes in the fabric. Higher quality bean bag chairs, constructed of materials such as leather, tend to be more durable, less likely to puncture and provide greater longevity, but a variety of other materials are available.

steps.title: Have a friend assist you in filling your chair.
steps.content: Have a friend assist you in filling your chair. One person holds the chair open while the other carefully pours the filling into the chair. Fill the chair in a room with no breeze, so the light filling doesn't blow around and make the procedure more difficult. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Close the zipper.
steps.content: Close the zipper. Some zippers have locks to keep the zipper closed. Others have special patches to keep them safe around small children. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Sit in the chair.
steps.content: Sit in the chair. You'll notice right away a sinking feeling like sitting in quick sand, as the filling settles and trapped air is pushed out of the chair. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Add more filler if you'd like a stiffer chair.
steps.content: Add more filler if you'd like a stiffer chair.

steps.title: Relax and enjoy the best furniture that has come into your life for a long time.
steps.content: Relax and enjoy the best furniture that has come into your life for a long time. Your chair will be your new best friend. Oh, and donâ€™t forget to get out of your chair and clean up your mess! [4] X Research source
